page.title: 19SOCIAL CONCERNS
page.content: In our survey we found the following predominant social concerns:- 1. Unemployment; this was the main concern and with 28%, the local figure it is understandable. 2. Vandalism ; the senseless breakage of public and private propery and the seemingly powerless position of the Police was of great concern. 3. Lack of amenitites especially for the young. No suitable open space and no variety of recreational provision was mentioned. Perhaps also with the government cutbacks there will be no improvement in the situation as far as recreation is concerned. {"The Devil makes work for idle hands {to do".
